Blog.post: Ah finally. The trip is almost here. A time to get away from the annoying parental units and spend time with friends. It shall be great fun. Especially my room wow were gonna bring some food I tell ya. And on a lower note. I don't know. Not sure who I really like at the moment. I did like someone else, but I never see him. And well... All I can say is that I really need some excitement in my life.

Wow. I just did it. I went downstairs, set the table like I was supposed to and ignored every word my mom said. She asked me if anything was wrong and something else... but I don't remember what cuz I was ignoring her. I kind of feel like I am screaming on the inside... but it was funny to see her just stop asking me questions because I didn't make a noise or talk. I like this. I absolutley hate them. No doubt about it. They are so annoying...

Lately my family buggs the crap out of me. I think I have literally reached the stage in a teenagers life where you dont speak to or of your family. I think I should lose my ability to talk. Then the only way I can express my feelings of anger to them is by giving them the bird.
Never mind kids. THat schedule is some what wrong. I'll just screw it and go with what my english teacher gave me instead of the stupid Clements Website.

People bugg me. The people who dont give a shit. I wont name names but I know people who were just Pre-UIL just laughing and squeaking/cracking (not going to give away the instrument) during the whole performance. I will tell you one thing. They sure aren't in Symphonic Band. If they were Mr. Matysiak would have stopped the band at a square... made you get of the stage and then go on with where he stopped. These are people who dont give a crap about band and definatley show it. I know people who dont give a crap about band. That doesn't bother me unless they disrupt during a concert/contest or what not. Talking in class... doesn't bother me at all. They can do that there... just not a concert. And when they do it buggs the living shit out of me. I mean come on people. Have respect. For 30 - 45 minutes at a concert. respect - To feel or show deferential regard for; esteem. To avoid violation of or interference with: respect the speed limit. To relate or refer to; concern. Why do they do it? I don't know. I work so hard at what I love and it kills me to see someone dis-respect it like that. They dont do jack while I work my ass off. Guess thats how Jack and Ass come together. Ug. By the way these people are freshman and I am not naming their names. If you realize this is you, please get your act together... I notice things. For those of you who I know hate band (I mean the ones who are IN band)... no I do not hate you. Some of yall are the coolest people on the planet. Band is what I love and I dont expect everyone of my friends too. You can talk in class give a laugh or tell a joke as much as you please. I do it too. So does everyone. Being a Nazi about it is annoying. People who do that during important things (I.E. CONCERTS and MARCHING SHOWS...) are really the only ones who I have something against. If you are one of these people and I have offended you, I am sorry. I just have a passion for it and it literally kills me to see people do that.

Haha, Tonight was great. Me, Guilio and Ashleigh went out to dinner at Papa La Rosa's Flying Pizza and then went to Marble Slab for dessert. Well it ends up that Guilio decided to change the security code on Ashleigh's cellphone and we tried other numbers too much and it wouldnt let us unlock it. So we went to Cingular store. They were CLOSED. Then we went to Ashleigh's house. Nothing to help us there. Then we finally try it again after not trying for a while... and it works. Finally after two hours of stealing Guilio's cellphone and what not. It was quite a night. I slept in quite a bit this morning and went to church before all of this. Today was fun. I need to get out and do stuff like this more often. 4 more days until San Antonio Trip!!!! It is going to be a blast. Truly I am enjoying lifes list of unanswered question's and I am up for some fun! If you are ever up to doing something just give me a call and you can drive or umm.. wait I cant drive. At least not legally, but you get my drift. So give me a call and let's go do something... anything! Yes I am talking to you , the person reading this blog.

I'm No Superman - Scrubs Theme Out the door just in time, head down the 405, Gotta meet the new boss at 8am. The phone rings in the car, the wife is working hard, She's running late tonight again. Well, I know what I've been told, you gotta work to feed the soul, But I can't do this all on my own, No I'm no, I'm no superman, I'm no superman. You've got your love online and you think you're doing fine, But you're just plugged into the wall. And that deck of tarot cards won't get you very far, There ain't no hand to break your fall. Well, I know what I've been told, you gotta know just when to fold, But I can't do this all on my own, No I'm no, I'm no superman, I'm no superman. You've crossed the finish line, won the race but lost your mind, Was it worth it after all? I need you here with me, coz love is all we need, Just take a hold of the hand that breaks the fall. Well I know what I've been told, you gotta break free to break the mold, But I can't do this on my own, no I can't do this all on my own, I know that I'm no superman, I'm no superman, I'm no superman... Someday, we'll be together, someday, Someday, we'll be together, someday, I'm no superman.
:-D I am just in an exceptionally good mood lately... many things are going good in my life. I am really starting to enjoy this!

Man, I am kinda upset I cant go to see Galloway's band. I heard they were really good... pooh, and I wanted to hear Ashley's solo!! I kinda forgot that tonight I am going to the mall and IHOP with some friends. That will be fun. My apologies to the Concert Band for not being able to attend. Good luck to you guys!

Salvation Belongs to our God Salvation belongs to our God Who sits upon the throne And unto the lamb Praise and Glory, Wisdom and thanks Honor and power and strength Be to our god, forever and ever Be to our god, forever and ever Be to our god, forever and ever Be to our god, forever and ever, Amen And we the redeemed shall be strong In purpose and unity Preparing our hearts With praise and glory, wisdom and thanks Honor and power and strength ... best song ever....

My goodness My mom pisses me off. I called her to come pick me up and she was like well im at your brothers tae kwon do class... ill be there in a little while. Okay... doesnt sound too bad? 5 - 10 ish minutes. NO...THIRTY FUCKING MINUTES! Sitting alone, all by myself in the teacher parking lot. If I would have known that I would ahve gotten a ride with one of my friends. And when I get in the car and I say "well I have been waiting for about thirty minutes.." SHE TRIES TO PROVE ME WRONG!!!! I should just ask my dad for a ride or someone else... man...Arr

Nothing new really. Just lots of homework. Tomorrow I have an SAT quiz, Romeo and Juliet Vocab quiz, Romeo and Juliet Act 1 quiz and nothing else really. Tonight is going to be so much fun... whoohoo. Thank goodness for spark notes or I wouldnt have much of a clue what they are talking about in Romeo and Juliet. Best be going. I have full band from 5 - 7. Need to do my homework now. I think I shall go to rehearsal in my pajamas...
I have found that my dad is even more retarted in making up things for the program for the spring concert. My parents make me sick. I can't wait... we get to play Harry Potter music HORRAY!!!!!!!!!!

Hey look! Gullable is written on the ceiling. Haha, Gullable people are funny. You kids rock my world. It's okay. I am gullable too... ask my friends, they have stories. P.S. I wasnt really gonna b.s. and suck-up on my section leader thing. Twas talking to people about that. Funny things we mess around with.

Yeah. I come home, in the best mood ever. I just had a good day I guess. No tests, no nothing. Cept I have to do some reading tonight. Romeo and Juilet, I like the story but it is kind of hard to understand. Then my mom comes in my room and shes like what do you want on the band ad. I say "I don't know". She's like what about... Great year Megan. I say no. That sounds so stupid shes a frickin idiot, my dad could come up with something interesting sheesh. What is her fucking problem. She buggs the crap out of me lately. I need to go out and do something with my friends. Hmm, I am bored. I must go fill out my section leader application that I am totally going to BS and Suck-Up on. And I also need to get Romeo and Juilet Cliff notes ha. Talk later
Wow, These things really make your deep inner thoughts from wayyyy down come out. I didn't know I even thought that. Or thought like that...

You know what I just thought of? What is life like outside of this shelterd society we live in? Is it scary or just damn boring. I ponder on what my future withholds for me. There is a world of uncertianty beyond the school buildings, nice houses, and fenced yards... Confusing, It is.

Caught in a world of confusion. What is this society we live in today? Such high and strange expectations. I do not seem to understand the importance of this and they satisfaction they get out of torturing us. You know what... I don't know what I just said. I should just get ready and go to school. I will see _______ there :) ... The spaces are not significant in any way to the persons name. Or maybe they are?

Nah. Eariler today I said I hate band. That's not true. Just the truking (substitute word for you know) end of the year I wanna get out of here is coming out. And my mom talking to me about crap gets me mad. Do your parents ever piss you off? I bet they do. And I bet you a million dollars that mine are worse. My mom calls my cell phone every five freaking minutes when I am out trying to have a good time away from my family with my friends. I have gotten into the habit of turning off my phone when I go places. much more peaceful then. I usually end up having messages on my phone from hea but who givers. She is too over protective. Man, I remember when I wasn't allowed to get in cars with my friends who drive. That pissed me off. i would like yell and scream at them ha! And when I went to the Lacrosse game with Jack, Jeff, Meg, Laura and Terrance my mom and dad were like "We think you should sit in the back seat of whoevers car you ride in." I was like okay whatever I'll do that. Ha, theyre so stupid. Like theyre gonna know. "You could distract the driver" says my parents. "Also make sure no one starts laughing and gets the driver to concentrate on anything other than the road" says mom. They really mean well, but it buggs the shit out of me. I am so glad I have more freedom than I did last semester.... I was one depreved little child. Sad thing that is too. Haha. Hrm. I dont really know what I was actually going to talk about on here. I guess I am letting some more anger out. Crankyness, end of school. Thank god!!!!!!!!! Well I am sorry if there are some mispellings or punctuation errors on here because at the moment I am laying on my brf, cordless keyboard in lap, looking at the cieling and not looking at the keys. This whole entry should be interesting to look at. Well, I know I am boring you to death. I'll tlak to you kids at school. I wonder when I will have C lunch again... Wim and Liz wanted to order pizza... but then if I do that... I wont get to sit with you know who. Uno person actually knows who that is so tough luck guessing! Later kids. P.S. This not looking at what I am writing helps expressing myself more openly without trying to use different phrases. Flows more i guess with out reading it to myself thinking I should add this and that...

I need to get out of this hell hole called school I am stuck in. To be loved is what I yearn most right now. Again like I posted a while back. I do have my eye on someone . Are you him? Or do you even have a clue. Does anyone seem to notice feelings like this anymore these days. Guess not... this world and everything in it is poop. I want school to get out so I can enjoy my summer. ... Not gonna be home alot, but who cares. Marching is going to be awesome next year. Cant wait...
I can't sleep....

On Thursday night I went out with Jack, Jeff, Laura, Meg and Terrance. We went to watch John at his Lacrosse game. That was great fun. Go Rangers! (We won) At half time we went to sonic for some food and we wanted to park the car and pile out of it on the sidelines. Too bad Jack couldnt find the entrance to do it. Oh well. We went to Starbucks after that and sat at a table and talked for a while. It was a very fun filled evening. Especially when Laura was getting John's keys out of his bag and she found his jock strap. haha. Great times it is...

Ha I just remembered something funny that happened. Erik Locascio said that Matysiak should conduct the beginning of Variation 4 in three. Turns out Galloway had the same idea. I wonder if Matysiak will listen....

Some highlights of the week: Algebra - I got a 93 on my quiz... highest grade in the class lol... I am such a retard. The problem I missed was our warm up today and I did it and I got it right. Then here comes back my quiz and I look at what I missed and ugg. oh well. 93 is still good lol :-P Lunch - We talk about random stuff... all the time. Today Cade took my seat so I had to go share a seat with Daniel and Jack. They scooted over on each side of their round chair and I got a chair! YAY! Haha, then after that me and Julie tried to see what kind of conversations we could come up with and see how many times Cade tried to bud in. We started talking about how we should have latteral time zones and stuff and then just as we realize it Cade tried to get a few words in on our conversation and soon Lisa, Erik, Katie, and John were talking about it. That was great stuff. Lunch yesterday - I had brought those little circus animal crackers that are like pink and white. You know, the ones everyone had when they were little. lol. So we get talking about foods we ate when we were little and Erik Locascio said that his mom wouldn't allow him to eat chocolate when he was little so he always had circus animals or animal crackers. He said that the circus animals were like crack to him as a kid. Great stuff. English - Well yesterday I found out my 5th 6 weeks average. I was kind of disappointed because I had a 97 on progress reports. My average now is a 92 :( But that's I got an 82 on my SAT vocab test and a 73 on Animal Farm test. That was HARD! Too many thinking questions for me! But hey on the brighter side... I got a 100 on my inner circle outer circle discussion on Animal Farm and that was a Major Grade! I can think of any more right now, but I know there is more... I'll post later if I remember. I have my eye on someone ...

Have you ever felt for someone so much but were too scared to tell? What if that person would never talk to you after that because they did not feel the same way? What would they do, what would they say? These questions run through my head day and night lately. I haven't actually liked someone in so long. It is like I almost forget what to do. You think you see him looking at you from the corner of his eye, but you cant tell. I look at him from the corner of my eye. Does he think the same thing I do? And if he does... is he as afraid to ask to find out as I am? I hope and pray to God that I can have courage to find out, some way or another. Crazy as I can be... I'd spin around in circles and see how fast I can run down the stairs without falling.... *cough* texas tech... Still, amongst my outgoing self, witty personality and bubblyness there is a point where I cannot express myself. I can show people I am happy, sad...but the hardest thing is to tell someone you love them. When you have had your heartbroken you never want (or enjoy) to do that to someone else or have it done to you. That, my friends, is why I don't know how to tell this "crush" of mine. You will get no clues, therefore, he could be reading this right now. Are you him? Do you feel like this about anyone? IM me and Tell... aim: trumpeteyetis

I know. Dont say it. You are going to tell me I am supposed to love and care for my family because they are the ones who will always be there. Well, your wrong... I DONT! They just bug the living shit literally out of me. I am not even joking. And to top that off they have been getting into my personal life. My dad has some program that tracks everything I do on the internet so he can limit my instant messaging use. For all I know he can be reading what I am typing on this here blog right now. My mom... argh. She just buggs me too. Whenever i get up finally to go do what she told me to, at that same moment she comes in and gives me this long lecture about it. ANd she gets mad when i try and tell her thats what i was getting up to do. You just dont understand. Little brothers... bugg the living daylight out of me too. Wait i mean living shit. hes just so annoying i cant take any of this any more. And my dad. Hes cool. Actually you know how girls run to their mommys to talk about crap. Well, no siree... thats not me. I'd rather talk to my dad. Honestly. I know, my life seems so miserable right now. But what i said up there only referrs to the "some things in life suck" in my profile. THe other half of that is "but others are just perfect". That, my friends, is you. The ones I can talk to and go hang out with out of the house so i can get away from my parents. But most of all that referrs to someone else... That would be you Rick. Rick, you rock my world right now and I love spending time with ya! You make my day so much more enjoyable. Enough about me... I want to hear about you...

Wow. I haven't written in here in a while... Been a bit too long. Well right now, I have the absolute worst cough and headache imaginable. It sucks so bad. Whenever I try to talk I sound like a boy going through puberty hahahaha. Last night I went to Ashley Arnold and Laura Matysiak's Graduation party... That was SOOOO MUCH fun!!! :) All I can really say right now is that exams suck and I am going to really miss my senior friends. I am so glad i met all of yall this year! You really helped me adjust into what I thought was going to be the scariest year of my life... Y'all dont forget to come back and visit. Graduation Song - Vitamin C... good song folks. Later, I am out.
I am so funny...
I have a bruise on my elbow, And a scar on my knee. It's the curse; Of Eric Chi.

I have always enjoyed classic music like this. But I have a greater pleausre listening to it lately. Maybe I was born in the wrong time period. Or not. I think I was born in the right time period... I have my reasons that no one knows :-P

On a little different topic... who do you think will be section leaders next year? Hmm.. that's a very good question to ponder.

I know, I know. You are going to tell me that I am a freshman and I dont even need to think about this but you know what, I have been lately. And it scares me to a degree. This year has flown right before my eyes. Just the thought of it leaving depresses me. I really wish I could stay a freshman forever, not really having anything to worry about except get used to high school. But no, in three weeks it will all be over. Then I will only have 3 more years living at home in the comfort of my own room and the city I grew up in. Then if all goes as planned I will go to UT at Austin and pursue a degree in music there. Yeah, I'm a die-hard longhorn fan... I lived there for two years. To me it just seems like next year wont be the same as this year has been. Yeah, the juniors and sophmores will still be here. And my 8th grade friends will be freshman... hehe beware kids. But see, I will miss the seniors. They have really been there for me, helped me out. Laughs, crazy times. Taking me home when my parents cant. The inside jokes, and just the fact that I was one of three fish in Matysiak's band. You know, life is so unpredictible. Zooming right before my eyes I dont know what my future withholds. I wish to know. But I cant. All I can do is live my life day by day. Thats what I have been doing. Honestly, I dont think I have ever looked at life with this perspective until maybe late last semester... or more this semester. Even though I do not know what is in the road ahead of me, I am excited but scared at the same time. Will it be the same without the seniors next year? What will I be like? Will I change? Will I still be the same Megan Elizabeth McDonough I am today? Who knows. This is all coming to me right now from looking at the yearbook and just imagining what the next three years have set aside for me. Right now I am treasuring every moment I have. You and all my friends will be memories for years to come. The laughs, the times, the cries, the everything. I want each and everyone one of you to know that no matter what, when we have high school reunions in 10-20 years I wont forget you or your face. I cant wait to see what my future has set aside for me...

San Antonio was so darn fun!!! I loved every minute of it. Being with my close friends, riding rollercoasters over and over and doing everything else imaginable. Hotels were actually really nice. Microwaves, fridge. Great fun. Concert went well too. But what sucks is I fell down the steep hill in my dress shoes. Thought I ruined my trumpet for a minute but apparently all I have is a bruise on my butt and one my elbow. I still say it is Eric Chi's conspiracy. My knee in marching band, and I was behind him when this happened. I cant wait to see what happens next. Oh. And at the Magic Time Machine for lunch this morning... well I had to go to the bathroom. So I went up to some random waiter and asked him "Where are the bathrooms?" It ends up when they are asked that they walk you around the restaurant making a huge deal of it, shouting it to everyone you know. Great fun. That restaurant has the coolest tables and everything! I want to go back there when I go to San Antonio for the DCI show this summer! Well it's time for me to go pick up my pictures. I will scan them in later and put my digital camera pics in later too. Check the website for San Antonio pictures. I will probably have them up by wednesday or so because I have some homework to work on before tomorrow. See you later kids.

Oh yeah. I didnt explain how my listening with Mr. Austin's dad went. Man, that was like so good! He gave me all these really good compliments and explained a bunch of stuff!! It was so helpful! He said I had tons of talent and that if I worked hard and had Mr. Austin and himself help me out alot i could do great things! That made my day so much better since i am grounded! He pretty much came out and said i was all-state material. I was liek WOAH! hehe sweet :) made me happy :)

Well I am grounded. Oh well. Til next monday. Then starting next thursday I have summer school for two weeks. No, I didn't fail anything... I am taking speech and healt so i dont have to during school. Haha, suckers. Being grounded isnt that bad. I think my mom is going to let me go to that Texas Music Festival at UH and Erik Plate's birthday party on saturday! HORRAY!!! That will make me happy :) I guess now that I am grounded i can stay home and do some summer cleaning and things i need to do. Clean room, write thank you notes for my bday. It should be that bad. Then I will also have a chance to practice my sexy sir!!! By the way... my sexy sir is my trumpet. His real name is Suiravidarts (you figure it out or just ask me) and i call him sir for short. That is so pimpastic!! The only thing that pisses me off about being grounded is that i cant see any of my friends. Especially you Rick :) hehe, you rock my world! SERIOUSLY! But hey, this morning when me and my mom were dropping off my brother at kids college i saw Becca hehe!!! Well I better go. Got some cleaning to do. Some chillin' by myself to do. Listen to music. Catch up on my television. Practice. Maybe even read my summer reading book! Who knows? But I still have all phone/internet privlediges so call me or IM ME!!!! hehe Later kids. Love, Meg

Why do I, or should I, care any more. I'm having fun right now, but then again I'm not. I am not quite sure what I am trying to say. But I cant explain it. Or at least I cant put it into words. Maybe I'm still mad at the world. Mad at everything. I feel as though I still cant get over the loss of my friend. That was quite a while ago, two years on October 11th of this year, but it still seems as though Ricky is supposed to be here. He didnt even die of any diseases or what not. He just died doing what he loved, gymnastics. He didnt even hurt himself either... What is with this world? And I never even got to say goodbye to him. Well on top of that, I hadn't seen him in a few years since we went to seperate schools after 4th grade and he lived a while away. So that made it even harder. Things like this in the world make me wonder. I wonder what our purpose of being here is, and how it came about. The sum of it still baffles me in each and every way... I just cant seem to figure it out. Oh well. I think I shall go find something interesting to do, go swimming, go out with someone, get away from this lonely house. In the mean time, you can sit here and wait for me to post again... Seems as though I am done for now.

Well look what I have here. I am back up posting. I find this thing very random at times. I always jump from topic to topic and confuse my readers... That is, if there is any one out there that actually reads this :-/ If your still reading this... That is a good sign :) Let's see... Tomorrow I start marching band back up. I am quite excited. I have been waiting for this season to start up forever. Other than the fact that now I have something to do the rest of the summer... its all good. And the fact that I can't do any thing tonight cuz I got home late from where I was tonight. But that's another story. Cuz of that, I get to wake myself up tomorrow and then go wake up mi madre. What crap. This whole world is crap. Well, not actually but hey. I just realized that I should eiher be sleeping or reading my summer reading book so, sadly enough... This mighty boring blog entery must come to an end. Leave me comments. :) I want some. I'll see some of you bright and early tomorrow. G'nite. Wait a sec. (Here comes my spaztic random thoughts thanks to A.D.D. :-P) The funniest thing tonight was when my bowling ball got stuck... more like just not coming up... Yancey started jumping and stepping all over the boards above the chute where the ball comes up. When he began to do that it just cracked me up! I had never seen anything like that. You make me happy Chris, always bringing a smile to my face :) hehe. Well Yeah, eventually the ball came up. That was fun :D

Man what is with me? I like hurt my heel really bad. For those of you who dont know. I jumped off the stage at the rock-a-thon and gave Kris Fortuno a high five. But see... I was barefoot. I like landed on my right heel somehow and hurt it really bad. The doctor said it might be broken... or it is just fractured or severley bruised it. (not really but you marching band nerds know what i mean) I talked to my dad a little eariler and I told him I was still gonna march. Like most likely march on monday, then we have tuesday off, ask to sit out on wednesday or just kinda walk to my sets and not march that much then be back the rest of the time. So I guess I'd stay off of my heel during the day and then give it my all in the two hours of marching. My plan seems as though it will work. Hope and pray that I dont do something stupid to make it worse and have to be out the rest of marching season. This years show is gonna kick ass... and I duno of anyone that can learn my sets :-/

Ever feel like your head is about to explode? That you just want to be left alone to sit on the computer and not have any one bother you. Well yeah. Me too. My parents are fucking annoying. I have just had a tiring day and I came home from Jeff's house and wanted to be left alone. I sat their for a while, like "la-de-da"... they will go away soon. But no, they dont shut up and dont leave. I finally had enough of it and started saying "pleeeeeeeeeeeease leave me alone". "I'm tiiiiiiired." You dont know how frusturating it can be to teach new freshman how to march. I mean... its not their fault that they dont know how. Just when they like sink down and petrude their hips foward, don't step off on 4 (more like step off on the and of 2...), they march like ducks, cant do what I show them to do even though I am giving it to them one on one, they lean towards the ground more with every step they take... even though I am only having them take one step and roll through. Ah, the list goes on. Sounds to me like I am being rude, but it just frusturates me a bit. I mean, I was a pretty good freshman marcher and it's hard for me to see why someone cant learn something when they're pretty much having a marching "private lesson" and having me talk about every little aspect of what they are/should be doing. Ah well. Today was a pretty good day. As usual I woke up around noon or so. Got up, lounged around the house and did pretty much nothing before marching started. Turns out that my parents were still downtown in a meeting and I had to frantically find a ride to band. Thank god Kaitlin was able to give me a ride. Then we had full band for the first half of band rehearsal. "La-de-da"... The usual stuff, we ate, went outsdie and did marching fundamentals. Then after that I was waiting for Leah so we could go to Jeff Langley's house for swimming and what not, but she and Carl had to change a 3rd bass drum head. Hehe. So Johnson walks in and is like "What the heck are yall doing?" And Leah was like "Were changing a drum head." So Mr. J decides to help and then after a while his phone rings. Then we hear this remark somewhat like "Man, I hope she's not in labor [referring to his wife whos baby is due this month]." He picks up his phone and we hear "Yeah, so did you call it in? Okay I'll call you back later." My first reaction to that was OMG Mrs. Johnson is in labor and he said he'd call her back!!! But luckily it turns out she wasn't. *Phew* So then Johnson was like "Do yall wanna hear what Mr. Galloway did when his wife was in labor?" And of course we did. So he told. Turns out, while Mrs. G was in labor Galloway decided to go to a job interview. Funniest thing I have heard in a while. Reminds me of the time 'the G man' told us that he asked his wife if all babies did was sleep, cry and crap. Haha, crazy stuff. *Rythm, Pitch, Son of a Bitch* Only some know what that is. Think ending of March from Symphonic Metamorphosis. Well I'm off to go to bed. Well not really. My parents believe that I am. I will probably end up playing solitare on my computer or something. Maybe even come back to the computer. Oh, and by the way. If you wanna come swimming and play games at my house tomorrow at 12:30. Just give me a call and drop by.

I want to give a big applaud to John on his wonderful blog. Man, I read that stuff and I just die laughing. I love how he finds a way to make fun of Jeff in each entry. Football game went pretty well. I know a few people who say they didn't do to well but I haven't watched the video so I am not quite sure yet. My solo/duet thing in Lento kicked ass as usual. Solo spots are so fun. Hey Jeff and Manish, we need to talk to The G Man about what we are gonna do about poses or what not. I still wanna do those. On another note, this week was my week for the Vehicle solo. I say it went quite well. I just need to Jazz it up during the next two weeks before time rolls around for my turn again. Maybe we can play it at a pep rally and I can bust out my stuff there for the whole school to see me in all my glory. Hmm, I still haven't figured out if I actually have homework or not this weekend. I better check on that before I decide to hit the sack tonight. Freshman are silly. And they should be banned from doing the "Ooo-ooo" thing with the drum line during one of their cadences because the screw them up. *shakes head in disappointment* Ah, and the cheerleaders changed the lalalalalalalala hey hey cheer, and now the drumline cant figure out what they are doing. Making the drum like look bad... how rude. (Just joking with anyone who took offense... The drum line will figure out what they did sooner or later) Im out, nitey nite kids.

As I sit here pondering, alone in the kitchen... I wonder if there is anything to look foward to for tomorrow. Though I am a happy person, there is something lingering inside of me that I can't seem to find. I think about it all day, what it might be and where it has come from, but there is still no answer. Maybe I feel alone in this odd place called earth. Or maybe I just want something to entertain me. These thoughts usually go away when I am in the presence of my friends... or what I have of friends, because again this year... I have no classes what-so-ever with any of my friends except those of them in my 7th period class. School hasn't been quite overwelming this year but band is taking over my life. As much of a passion I have for music I just wish I could have a day off. Seems as though that each year I progress in school, I keep finding the friends who are closer to me and the ones who I occasionally say 'Hey' to and not really have any significant or intelligent conversations with. It begins to sadden me and makes me feel like I am lost in the world. I don't know where this post is going because if I do not stop now, I feel as though it will turn into a book. Wait no, more like a novel. I am out for now. Call my cell if you want to go do something tonight. Please, I need to get my mind off of the world and go drink coffee with friends and just talk, laugh and enjoy life.
Happy Birthday Eric!! How do you want your present? :-P

Lately I have been trying to sort out my thoughts. Though it does not seem to be working. It feels like I have a huge filing cabinet with lots of papers scattered thoughout the entire room. I decide to get started but then realize I dont have any folders to put the papers in, and on top of that... No labels for each section. I am deeply confused in this world and I guess I should go try and find some folders and labels. Where do you get some of those?
I feel like a little kid, lost in a grocery store, with no where to go and no where to hide...

Okay. So I called Leah eariler, and I was like "Hey I'm bored." And she told me that after she ate dinner we could go do something. So I go on minding my own biznass both excited about my soon to occur shenanigans of the night and practicing my trumpet til she comes home. When I think she might be almost home I go ask my mom "Hey can I go do something with Leah tonight? I don't have any homework and theres nothing to do." Well you'd think shed say "Sure Megan, its only like 7 30 right now.. Be back home at 9 30 - 10 like usual." But no! She has to give me some shit about how I had an 'attitude' last night. That is totall bull crap. Well for one, do you expect someone to talk nice back to someone who is talking rudely/with an attitude to them? I think not, and good; you do too. So you are at least on the same chapter and maybe even the same page as me in my book. So here she goes, rambling on and on how I had this attitude last night and all I want to do is get out of the house for the main reason of her, giving me all this non-sense that really bothers me. She was the one who had the attitude last night and always seems to be the one with the attitude and so that was my main reason for how I acted the night before. It is so stupid too. I was on the computer and my mom was like "Megan get off." "Sure," I told her, "I will be off in like 5 minutes after I say bye to everyone." Two minutes later, I am still on the computer, hence my 5 minutes I asked for is not up. Then my dad walks into the room and my mom exclaims "What is wrong with her? She still is not getting off that computer." So I stand up and tell her "Well, I AM getting off the computer right now. I'm not the one whining and complaing to dad about how im taking soooooo long to get off." Well, yeah. As I read over that and think about the happenings of last night I can understand why she would be mad at me, but how come I have no reason to be mad at her? Things like this in life puzzle me, like everything else on this darn planet. One more annoying thing and then I will stop my ranting and raving about this. After this all occured last night, I just closed all my boxes (sorry if I didn't say 'bye' to any of y'all) and ran upstairs to my lovely room which has a lock. I (not thinking) get in my room and shut the door and lock it. But see... the shut of my door turned into a slam out of the adrenalin rush going through my body and anger racking every bone and organ. So at the time my dad just so happened to be walking by. He hears the door slam and yet again, comes and pounds on my door and slams it open so hard that the molding on the side comes off. Therefore, now I dont really have much of a door. Just a door that swings back and fourth with nothing to keep it shut. Kinda sad, aye? Furthermore, I am not quite happy with my family right now and needed to get this steam out of me. There is more to this story but I am not going to get into details. I still have anger fluctuating through my entire body. This has most of it out though. I just wish I could get away from my whole world for like a week and go someplace else, with other people (and maybe take some of yall with me, you guys know who you are) to just live the happier part of my life. Oh well, maybe some hot tub action by my self tonight with the sounds of the leaves in the breeze and the pitter-patter of squirrels running across the ground and into the trees will soothe my thoughts and emotions. On a higher note, I don't have homework. So talk to me and make me happy. :)

You know the people who always exclaim "I HATE HIGH SCHOOL! I WANT OUT NOW!!!" ? I can't even see why they would think that. These are the last four years we live here with our families and close friends whom we have known since middle school, and maybe even elementary or Pre-K. As I sit here, watching videos and looking at pictures of people I have come to realize that I really do only have 3 years left here. All the football games, crazy shinnannigans, random trips to the mall and just being with friends are truly my best memories. I am writing this mainly thinking about all my senior friends who went off to college this year and watching them come back and visit. Things are so different without them, yet they still seem the same. Take last night for example. We were playing William Tell Overture in the stands the usual da-ga-da da-ga-da da-ga-da da-da and so on. Then we come to the grand pause and I hear someone belt out a scream. Matysiaks face lit up and that baffled me. Usually Matysiak doesnt exactly enjoy hearing someone scream in the grand pause, but then I realized; It has to be Brindley. So I turn around and just as I though, there was David standing next to the tubas. You made my day Brindley, you really did. Little things such as someone even just screaming, you know you will remember it for the rest of your life. Just thinking about leaving this routine of football games, crazy stuff and so on makes me tear up. Im not ready to leave and I know I wont be leaving anytime soon, but I guess I have come to realize that I need to treasure the time I have with my friends before they leave and make the best of it. So, I guess what I am trying to say, is that after I graduate and start a new life I would love to live high school over again. With all this crazyness of being a teenager, sometimes it makes life a bit easier so to say. You dont have to work and you dont have to take care of a family, because you already have someone doing this for you. So for all of you college freshman out there, I bid you the best of luck and you better not forget me! Keep in touch.

Sorry didn't quite make it clear that the information I talked about in that last entry was obtained orignally by Jeff. http://jefflangley.blogspot.com I just decided to talk about it a bit in my own blog because I thought it was quite interesting. Just thought I'd make that clear with you folks.

Just read Jeff's blog. Quite interesting I must say. There are studies that say when you listen to repeitive music, such as rap, it makes you stupid. But I believe that the music does not need to be rap to make you stupid. Take for example 'The Canyon'. Do the band directors have a long drawn out plot against us, the students, to make the so called 'smarties' at Clements stupider? Maybe so. Therefore, that is probably why we are having trouble playing it. That is, because we have heard it so many times that we know the rhythm so well, but still cant seem to play it. Some might beg to differ with me and I agree with them. There are some people in our band who just simply can't play it. Maybe the music really doesn't make us stupid. So if not... just stick to the latter... "There are some people in our band who just simply can't play it." Ponder on that for a while smarty-pants. Or maybe you have become stupid from The Canyon. Don't blame me. Blame Philip Glass. He is coming into town soon... You can rant to him about it.

I, still at that stage between being a child and an adult with the outmost freedom, still seem to be confused in this little place we call Earth. Sometimes I feel as though I do not know where I belong or who my real friends are. Maybe I should be alone forever. I find that when I am alone I am happier, and when I am with some people I just kind of sit there wishing I could be having fun. I really dont know where I am going with this but who cares. La-de-fucking-da. Anger runs through my head. I'm angry because I don't feel like some people care. So what if they invited me... It could be just because they always have and don't want to stop. "What are you doing?" Im just sitting here. "Oh okay." *walks off* (inner thoughts) So they don't even care to come talk to me, comfort me, help my anger and frustrations clear out of my head. I don't know myself. Who am I? Where am I? What will I become? I dont know what that was. Oh well. Game tonight. On Halloween... How dumb. Maybe I will practice my region music a little more before I go.

Well, since the new year is approaching.. I have decided to make some new years resolutions of my own. 1. Be a better friend and an all around better person. 2. Get better grades 3. Practice more 4. Save money Those seem fairly legitimate dont you think? I believe if I stick with that, I will be come a better person as a whole and be more fun to be around. Things like practicing for a certain amount of time each day and getting good grades will help me get into UT. I have gotten okay grades this year and I havent been able to practice as much as I want to. But starting with that foundation, I believe that if I keep my priorities fairly high I can get into where ever I want. You know, I really havent been thinking about college as much as I should. I really should stop going on the Internet too. That is a big time waster right there. Amazing how things like that can suck up your time, not even letting you realize how much time you are spending on it. Another thing, I have noticed that some of my friends I had through out middle school we dont have as much in common any more. We started high school last year, had all different classes, never saw each other. I kind of wish that I could relive old memories from middle school again, but I guess I really cant. The friends I still have now understand what I am talking about. We have sat and talked about this too, kind of sad thinking that I will not be here in 2 and a half more years, but at the same time it is very exciting. I really cant wait. Okay, enough of the past/future stuff. Lets talk about now. I really havent used this to talk about me personally. I just sort of rant and ramble on about things that happen in my life, what funny thing happened at lunch today, or what kind of weird things I heard people say. Big whoop. I wish I could let more people get to know the real me. Yeah yeah I know you are thinking to yourself, What the crap are you talking about Megan. But once you think about it how well does everyone know each other. Could you tell me what my favorite food is, whats my favorite color, have I lived here all my life?, when was the last time me and a member of my family got in a fight. Dont know those answers? Well, maybe that isnt what shows whether or not someone knows you well enough or not. But for one, I know you cant just be an acquaintance to someone and believe you know them inside and out. No, not just being with me when my friend died just knowing that someone is there and that they understand how you think is when you truly know someone. Mmmkay. I dont know where I was going with that. Maybe its just my mind talking, and maybe by reading this you can get to know me even better than you already do. Well I am out for now. Later folks.

Hmm, I feel as though I am a bit home sick right now. Sometimes I would rather just sit at home and do nothing, or be in the presence of my friends. Yes, I do enjoy coming and visiting my relatives... but when I just sit here and don't do anything I realise I could be in the comforts of my own home and my own town at that moment. It makes me wish I could have just stayed home. Last night, it was hard for me to sleep. For one, I dont like going to bed early but I had to. :-/ That was a bit harder than I thought it would be. Especially because of some factors. First of all I miss someone like crazy right now. It was hard to leave him at home. Then my dad. Oh dear. He snores like no other. Sounds like snot is stuck up all in his nose and he is really loud too. So that didn't help either. So I guess at about one I finally drifted off into a peaceful slumber. But then guess what, I wake up at 3:20 to... My dad snoring. I got up, walked around and tried to think of something to help me get to sleep. Didn't work, so I layed down again. Of course, I fell asleep again. But guess what else happened? At around 5:25, I hear whining. Whining and crying. You are probably wondering (well if anyone actually reads these...) what or who is whining and crying. Yes, you guessed it. My brother's puppy. Of course because I was homesick and not in that deep of a sleep I was the only one who heard it. I got up, picked Georgia up out of her cage, fed her food and water and tried to get her to go potty and then finally back to sleep. What an eventful night. I hope tonight is not nearly as crazy. *sigh* I need something to do right now. Seems as though I am a bit bored. I wish I could have ran to the book store before I left Sugar Land and bought Les Miserables. Maybe Wal-Mart would have it. Hmm. Well, I am just counting down the days til I can get home, even though 2 days after that I have to go to school. Hmm, how about an adendum on those New Years Resoultions of mine. I believe I am going to stop drinking cokes. Well, soda in general. Those things are like an addiction and I really need to stop drinking them. So far this year I have been good and I haven't had one. I've thought about it but I just changed my mind to water when I thought about it. Not that bad actually. I will probably get to the point where I have one ocassionally, but not yet. Need to get my self un-addicted... if that is even possible. I believe it is. Don't really know where this entry is going but I found I feel better after I get my thoughts out by typing them in this blog of mine or writing in my kick-ass journal I bought at Barnes and Nobles. I am out. I am going to be in Arkansas until Sunday. Me and my family will leave sometime Sunday morning to drive home. It's about a 10 hour drive, which includes all the pit stops for food and what not. So it really should be 8 - 9 hours. But oh look, I am rambling again. Oh well. Later folks.
Happy 2004.

Well hello again. I haven't blogged in quite a while... so it seems. Let's give a quick update. School is gay, I must say so myself. Not like it's hard or anything, I just find that I am getting even more bored with school each and every day. We go to school and do practically the same thing every day. I swear some days... if I didn't have people to see between classes and people to talk to at lunch, I would go insane. You know what else bugs the crap out of me? THe fact that school has trained us like dogs. How have they done that you ask? Well think about it. Everyone hurries their little butts off to get to class on time before some silly little bell. Then we sit their anxiously awaiting the next bell so we can get up and try and get to our next destination before the bell rings, yet again. Mkay. Enough of that. You know what? My life seems as though it is absolutley perfect right now. I am not even exaggerating to the least bit. It is all because of one person too. That person is Saunders. You mean the world to me baby and you make me so happy. Being with you is so much fun, and we have the grandest of times when we spend time with eachother. You are never not on my mind and I cant get enough of it. Life with you makes perfect sense... it really does. This has been the best month (well almost a month) of my life. Words can't explain how I feel for you Saunders and I hope this lasts forever :-D I love you!

I have not updated in quite a while, so bear with me because I will probably just be rambling to release some stress off my back. Life to me right now, seems utterly perfect. There is nothing that worrys me and I seem to be more on top of things. Procrastination has flown out my window, and I'm not going to stop the car to merely walk back to get it. Now I am able to be lackadaisical and laugh at people who have to do things at the last minute. Also, I seem to always have a smile on my face whether or not I show it. I can remember a time when I dreaded waking up in the morning for the sole reason that I did not wish to go out and live life. Those times are bad memories and now that I have come up from that low dip in life... I plan to stay on this high hill for quite a while. Well, I need to get to my homework right now, but I will finish this entry later. There is not much else I can say because I am at a loss for words. Not like anyone reads this though...

Do you know what it feels like to love and be loved in return? Love (n.) - A deep, tender, ineffable feeling of affection and solicitude toward a person, such as that arising from kinship, recognition of attractive qualities, or a sense of underlying oneness. To me, that is just a dictionary definition because love means much more to me than that. It is what gets me up in the morning. It is what races through my head, day and night. By far, love is the best feeling in the world. Love to me, in the relationship matter, means that you share a special, unbreakable bond between you and that significant other. That bond is held together with the feelings you get from that other person and the feelings you give them. You put trust into one another and everytime you see them happy you are happy. Every time you see them sad, you become sad as well. They are someone who you are attracted to, not only for what they look like, but for who they are inside. For me, I am in love with Saunders Lin. He is the joy of my life, and I couldn't ask for anyone or anything else. Never have I felt so happy all the time. Each night I go to bed thinking of him and I wake up each morning still thinking of him. This love I have is everlasting and nothing can break it. I just pray to God that he can help keep this strong, and I thank him every day for the times I get to spend with Saunders. Saunders, you truly make my life complete and I dont know where I would be without you. "I don't know where I'd be without you here with me life with you makes perfect sense you're my best friend."

Starting today, I have begun a new routine. It consits of how I do things when I get home from school. I know, corny, but it has to be done. No, I am not doing this to bring up my grades (well actually that sort of has something to do with it) but this 6 weeks was higher than any other 6 week this year thus far. I have decided that much buckling down is needed and I am not just going to think about doing it, as I do with my other list of ideas, but I am going to actually come through with it. So far it is working out extremely well. My plans are that I get home in the afternoon, wether it is after sectionals or right after school, and take about an hour break. During that hour I am allowing myself to do whatever I please, except homework. It will get my mind off of school for a while. Then after that hour has concluded, I begin to do homework. You folks know how that goes. Then when I am halfway through my work I give myself a 30 minute "Talk on the phone/aim break". After that I conclude my studies and then talk on the phone or aim (or whatever) and go to bed at about 9:30. *This is really only for my thoughts folks, but I decided I might share it with all of you* And well look at the time. It's 9:30, I talked on the phone and said good night to Saunders :) and I have finished studying for my two tests tomorrow (which so happen to be in History and Geometry) and I completed all my retarted homework. Things in my life seem to be going quite well as a matter of fact. There is one person right now that seems to just make my life go perfect. When I am in their presence everything feels right and I haven't felt this happy in quite a while. Mind you people, I might have seemed quite happy, yes indeed, at school but I might not have been on the inside. Right now I can truly say that I haven't felt angry (well except for little stupid things liek everyone does) in such a long time. Saunders, this 2 months on Friday have been the happiest 2 months of my entire life. I wish I would have known all this 13 years ago in toddler class ;) Wow, that seems like such a long time ago. And it was. As I sit here realizing how fast time is flying by... I realize that I am truly going to miss this years seniors. Y'all are such fun people and I am really going to miss you. But we've still got 3 months of band hell to deal with right? Right. Well, this time.. I am really off to bed. Enough of my rambling. I've needed to really write in here for a good while. Good night and have sweet dreams kids. Ooooh one more thing! I can't wait to go see The Passion of Christ this Sunday!!!!! EEEE!!!

Saunders 2. my friends 3. getting my lisence in 42 days!!!

Well, today was quite an eventful day. I woke up and worked on my music history paper. I dont liek that thing. Then Saunders came over and we hung out at my house and what not. After that we went downtown to the Wortham Center to hear Kacy sing! OMG SHE WAS SO GOOD!!! hehe. Then we went with James and her to the Aquarium for dinner and we rode the Ferris Wheel. Those are damn fun ;) If ya know what I mean. And then we came home, end of story. Lol. Yesterday, I recieved some bad news. I'm not sure that I really wanted to hear this but, my grandpa has lung cancer. I dont really think that the reality of it all has sunk in fully, but he has like 3 golf ball sized tumors in his lungs. One in the right and two in the left. He probably doesn't have long to live and I know this is going to take me down a hard road but that's life, right? I mean yeah, I have never had a family member die. The only thing like that that had ever happened to me was in 8th grade when my friend Ricky died. That was by far one of the hardest things to ever deal with in my entire life. I just hope and pray that I will be able to go see him before he dies (if he doesn't get through it... I know thats bad but yeah, I wanna see him). Because I never got to see Ricky before he died and it still hurts. Enough of this depressing talk. I'm out. Leave your thoughts please.

Quote of the day: "I'd wake up right next to him." - Eric Marfin... in reference to Matysiak telling Locascio that he would call him and wake him up tomorrow morning since he did not know what time 2nd period started. Classic, just classic. But a disturbing thought too. What are those two doing?
*blegh*

Right now, I am so darn sick of people. You know how there are people you seem to get along with and people you dont seem to get along with at all right? Well, those people I dont get along with are getting extremely annoying. I just want to stuff a sock in their mouth so I dont have to hear them talk. Maybe I am just not much of a people person or something. I dont know. But I am getting fed up with people and their rude/stupid remarks. So fuck you. Life sucks... except for the one person who makes mine a million times better. That is all I have to say for now. Homework calls.

Long time no blog. Well, I haven't really posted in quite a while because quite frankly I think I bore my readers. But then I remember, oh yes that is ultimatley beyond the point of blogging. So going to the actual point of blogging... here are my thougts as of late. Tomorrow is my birthday, and I am really excited! 16!!! Watch out, here I come! And as means of birthday parties or whatever, I believe I will have mine 2 weeks from now after my drum major camp and after I go visit my grandpa in florida who isn't doing too well. So yeah, those things are a bit more important than a party to me right now. Plus, I get to go to Disney World with my cousins while in Florida! Whoopie. For now I shall close this post because my dog peed on my bed and I am in dire need of some food. Later haters.

Saunders left for Taiwan this morning and I have 18 days to myself; to do whatever I please. I don't have a clue what I am going to start with. Maybe I can re-do my room like I was planning on this summer. It is also a big mess too, egads! Or maybe I should go running or something in that respect. Oh yeah, and I am going to practice like a mother because I want to do good at Region/Area... and possibly All-State if I put my mind into it. I already practiced for a little while today and I am planning on putting in a few more practice sessions unless I find something else to do. Call my cell if you wanna go do something sometime.

Lately I have been keeping a written Journal of my thoughts and I have been writing in there every day since June 18. Hard to believe huh? Since I am bad about updating my blog and all. Let me tell you about my day. Today at around 11:30 my mom trys to wake me up. I remember her telling me she was going to the Galleria and wouldn't be back for a while. Simply I nodded my head okay, and when she left the room... I rolled over in my bed and went back to sleep. Continuing to sleep until around 2 or so, I am awakened by a familiar cell phone ring. I open my eyes and think, "Oh, that is Saunders' ring..." then I realize what I had just thought and rummage around for my cell phone, luckily answering it before it was done ringing. Finally, my mom comes home from the Galleria and Saunders and I decide to go out and do stuff. We take my moms car and after a few errands we decide to go see Dodgeball. Hilarious movie I tell you, but whoever wrote it must be a boring person. I mean a movie about dodgeball? Haha. We go back to my house and then decide we are hungry and want to eat Chick-fil-a for dinner. On the way there I sang along to my Les Misrables CD enjoying myself. So we walk in to Chick-fil-a arguing whether or not he would let me pay for myself... and he won, I couldn't pay and we go up to the cashier just to see Jason Chow! Man, I hadn't seen him for so long. It was quite a surprise to see him. Jason and I talked for a bit while he took our order and he of course asked how my music history final was. And I told him that it was very easy, and he laughed because everyone knows that it wouldnt be graded hard since I was the only one taking it. Hmm, I think that is all I really did today. My mind just went blank. "At the end of the day..." *sings*
